
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Disallow admin and private areas
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /_next/
Disallow: /auth/

# Allow important pages
Allow: /blog/
Allow: /about/
Allow: /contact/
Allow: /trips/

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://awaitingadventures.com/sitemap.xml

# Crawl delay for better server performance
Crawl-delay: 1
